BattleEffectText.Name: Puppet Strings
BattleEffectText.Desc: Speed dice +1. Upon death, revives in 2 Scenes. The character will take 8 damage whenever a stack of this status is lost.

BattleEffectText.Name: Red Mark
BattleEffectText.Desc: Lasts one Scene. Targeted by Puppet Angelica and the extra Speed dice added by 'Puppet Strings'.
